blogPost.excerpt: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
blogPost.body: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
blogPost.title: Pyro - Spotify music voting for parties
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 举办派对？让你的客人实时选择音乐与Pyro! 连接您的 Spotify 帐户，创建一个派对，用链接邀请您的客人，然后您就可以开始了。协作聆听从未如此简单。
舉辦派對？讓你的客人實時選擇音樂與Pyro! 連接您的 Spotify 帳戶，創建一個派對，用鏈接邀請您的客人，然後您就可以開始了。協作聆聽從未如此簡單。

localize.description: Recur的功能丰富，iOS特有的风格让Recur正好适合你的主屏幕，让订阅跟踪变得简单快捷。
Recur的功能豐富，iOS特有的風格讓Recur正好適合你的主屏幕，讓訂閱跟蹤變得簡單快捷。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 39 days in a row, down 56% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/hGWdE9F87y

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院率已连续39天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了56%。🙏 https://t.co/hGWdE9F87y。
科維德-19在美國的住院率已連續39天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了56%。🙏 https://t.co/hGWdE9F87y。
